Very good copy. Thank you! Just one thing: The display aspect ratio for Toy Story 1 + 2 is wrong. I noticed that the display size is given wrong in the MKV container. It can easily be fixed by simply opening the file with MKVmerge/MKVtoolnix, then select the video track and go to the format specific options. There you can change the value for width to 1280 pixels.
Is there a chance of ripping Finding Nemo (2003)? So far, there is no decent copy at reasonable file size out there. And TYNYFYD's copy has cut off sound at the end.

Anybody having trouble with the subs being locked, I don't even download the subtitle file but they still show up, seems to happen with some of RiddlerA's files

Nevermind I fixed it, anybody else having this issue do this;

Download MKVToolNix(free program)
Put the MKV file into it
Deselect all the text options
Click Maux, it will only take around 20 seconds per movie so its not bad

I hate editing someone else's stuff but I didn't have a choice because the subs were forced in WMC, sorry RiddlerA

Thanks for the great ups
